cockpit.title: Cockpit
cockpit.assetIsCurrentDeposit: You've deposited {{ASSET}} and therefore can't borrow it.
cockpit.minCRatio: This will put your position at our minimum collateralization ratio, therefore placing your account in liquidation territory. Are you sure?
cockpit.belowMinRatio: You are undercollateralized. Deposit or repay your debt to avoid liquidation.
cockpit.subjectToLiquidation: This trade lowers your collateralization ratio to {{NEW-C-RATIO}}%, which places you in the range of liquidation subject to market volatility. The minimum collateralization ratio is {{MIN-C-RATIO}}% before partial liquidation. Would you still like to {{TRADE ACTION}}?
cockpit.geobanned: Jet Protocol is not available in your region.
cockpit.noMarket: We were unable to initialize the Jet marketplace.
cockpit.txSuccess: Your {{TRADE ACTION}} of {{AMOUNT AND ASSET}} was received.
cockpit.assetIsCurrentBorrow: You've borrowed {{ASSET}} and therefore can't deposit it.
cockpit.belowMinCRatio: You are undercollateralized. Deposit or repay your debt to avoid liquidation.
cockpit.noBalanceForDeposit: You have no {{ASSET}} in your wallet to deposit.
cockpit.noDepositsForBorrow: You must deposit collateral in order to borrow.
cockpit.noDepositsForWithdraw: You have not deposited any {{ASSET}} to withdraw.
cockpit.rejectTrade: This trade would lower your collateralization ratio to {{NEW-C-RATIO}}%, which would be below our minimum ratio of {{JET MIN C-RATIO}}. Would you still like to borrow?
cockpit.insufficientLamports: You are depositing all your SOL leaving you no lamports for transaction fees! Please try again with a slightly lower input amount.
cockpit.stillUndercollateralized: Your new C-ratio of {{NEW-C-RATIO}}% is still under Jet's minimum marketplace collateralization ratio of {{JET MIN C-RATIO}}%. Please consider repaying more to avoid liquidation.
cockpit.rentFeeDescription: I see this is your first time flying with Jet. Please note that to open your account, this transaction will include a refundable one-time rent fee. This is necessary for the Solana blockchain to store ongoing data related to your account. This fee is not collected by Jet Protocol.
cockpit.rentFeeDetail: The rent fee for your transaction is {{RENT_FEE}} SOL. This amount will be returned to when you {{TRADE_ACTION}} your full balance.
cockpit.minColRatioNote: Note: Minimum c-ratio before partial liquidation is {{MIN_COL_RATIO}}%.

settings.title: Settings
settings.worldOfDefi: Connect your wallet to the world of DeFi.

unhealthy.detail: Your Collateralization Ratio (your total deposited value divided by your total borrowed value) is {{C-RATIO}}% which is {{RATIO BELOW AMOUNT}}% less than Jet marketplace's minimum collateralization ratio of {{JET MIN C-RATIO}}%.
unhealthy.solution: In order to correct your position, you can deposit more collateral, but I suggest you repay your debt in the Cockpit.

tenPercent.overview: You are dangerously close to liquidation.
tenPercent.detail: Your Collateralization Ratio (your total deposited value divided by your total borrowed value) is {{C-RATIO}}% which is within 10% of Jet marketplace's minimum collateralization ratio of {{JET MIN C-RATIO}}%.
tenPercent.solution: In order to avoid liquidation, you can deposit more collateral.

twentyPercent.overview: Keep an eye on your collateralization ratio.
twentyPercent.detail: Your Collateralization Ratio (your total deposited value divided by your total borrowed value) is {{C-RATIO}}% which is less than 20% above Jet marketplace's minimum collateralization ratio of {{JET MIN C-RATIO}}%.
twentyPercent.solution: Raise your collateralization ratio to healthy levels of 20% or more by depositing more collateral.

deposit.overview: {{BEST DEPOSIT RATE NAME}} is lookin' good right now.
deposit.detail: {{BEST DEPOSIT RATE ABBREV}} has the best deposit rate in the market right now at {{DEPOSIT RATE}}%, and your account is in good standing so we recommend adding some collateral by depositing a portion of your {{USER BALANCE}} {{BEST DEPOSIT RATE ABBREV}}.

healthy.detail: Your account is in good standing and is healthily over-collateralized, let me take a look at the market and see if I can suggest some good moves for you. Check back with me later!

alert.airdropSuccess: We have Airdropped you {{UI AMOUNT}} {{RESERVE ABBREV}}.
alert.originationFee: There is a fee of {{ORIGINATION FEE}}% attached to this loan.
alert.disclaimer:
You are about to enter the Jet Protocol Mainnet. Do not proceed if you do not understand and accept the Terms of Use, and potential for financial loss.

TERMS OF USE PRIVACY POLICY

transactions.title: Flight Logs
transactions.noTrades: You have no logged transactions with Jet.
